attributes.action: Close the British Embassy in Dubai
attributes.background: Lack of help and assistance failure to provide duty of care

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want to make a complaint about the services you've received, you can find out how to do that here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/foreign-commonwealth-office/about/complaints-procedure
